channel.title: Help With Note++ Please!
channel.description:
Alright so here's the problem...
I have followed every step to about every tutorial ever created into creating your own server.
At the part when you have to go into "Note++" and press "CTRL F" to open up the search. I type in the name of every source I`ve downloaded, and every time it doesn`t work. :(
Also, when I right click on "Compile.Bat" and "Run.Bat" I don`t get an "Edit" option, does anyone know why?
Thanks! :D

item.title: Help With Note++ Please!
item.dc:creator: @Aleksander Aleksander
item.description:
@Aleksander wrote:

Now this is really weird…

Like 5-10 minutes ago I was able to type in “no-ip” into the search bar, just tried it and it doesn’t find anything anymore!

Read full topic

the note++ thing sometimes ctrl+f doesnt work with a space
